thread.section_title: American Advisors Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Advisors Group | americanadvisorsgroup.com
thread.title: Susan Angle
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Susan Angle

author: Susan Angle
title: Susan Angle
text:
I thought my main contact, Zach Hayes, was great and always on top of things. The notary seemed always aware of the time and did say partly thru the meeting that she was running late. Even if she didn't mean to, she made us feel rushed.
I did have to email Zach twice to get our trust returned.
